text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the AERO 15 OLED SA-7US5020SH UHD AMOLED i7-9750H NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6 GB GDDR6 8 GB RAM 256 GB M.2 PCIe SSD Win 10 Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the AERO 15 OLED SA-7US5020SH UHD AMOLED i7-9750H NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6 GB GDDR6 8 GB RAM 256 GB M.2 PCIe SSD Win 10 Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the AERO 15 OLED SA-7US5020SH UHD AMOLED i7-9750H NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6 GB GDDR6 8 GB RAM 256 GB M.2 PCIe SSD Win 10 Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the AERO 15 OLED SA-7US5020SH UHD AMOLED i7-9750H NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6 GB GDDR6 8 GB RAM 256 GB M.2 PCIe SSD Win 10 Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the AERO 15 OLED SA-7US5020SH UHD AMOLED i7-9750H NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6 GB GDDR6 8 GB RAM 256 GB M.2 PCIe SSD Win 10 Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
